scripts.get: wget http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForAdvancedModeling/GeometricShapes/Dodecahedron.x3d; wget http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForAdvancedModeling/Inspiration/ObliqueStrategies.x3d; wget http://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/HelloWorld.x3d; wget http://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.4.xsd ; wget http://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.4-Web3dExtensionsPublic.xsd ; wget http://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.4-Web3dExtensionsPrivate.xsd; java -jar node_modules/jsonix/lib/jsonix-schema-compiler-full.jar -generateJsonSchema -compact -logLevel TRACE -d mappings x3d-3.4.xsd -p x3djson -b bindings.xjb; wget http://www.jsonix.org/jsonschemas/w3c/2001/XMLSchema.jsonschema; wget http://www.jsonix.org/jsonschemas/jsonix/Jsonix.jsonschema
scripts.gen: node js/genJSON.js Dodecahedron.x3d ObliqueStrategies.x3d HelloWorld.x3d; node js/marshal.js Dodecahedron.json2 ObliqueStrategies.json2 HelloWorld.json2
